page.title: 07CLUBS IN COWPLAIN
page.content: In our area we are studying there is an{Activities Centre}and a{Social {Club.}The Activities Centre is in Padnell Road,Cowplain. To use it you have to be a member and pay a subscription. In the Centre there are two groups one is for juniors and one is for adults. For the adults there is keep fit, slimming and badminton. For the juniors there is music time, floor exercises, youth club, movement and dance, mother and toddler and gymnastics. For the Social Club you also need to be a member. There are darts and snooker. They sometimes have a singer and sometimes bingo, they have weekly dances too. They have recently started indoor bowls and they have a football club as well. They have three bars which sell drinks, crisps, sweets and nuts.
